All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
Card
A Simple Card Class that represents a flashcard - linking the question to the subject, topic and user.
CardDAO
The DAO object for interacting with the Card Table over the specified connection
CardDeckController
A class to control the GUI for test screen
CreateAccountController
A class that handles the Create Account GUI
CreateNewFlashcardsController
This is a class that handles the Create Flashcard GUI
DashboardController
This class controls the dashboard GUI
DatabaseConnection
This class connects the Model objects to the SQL database connection (through the dao objects)
FlashCardDraft
This class converts the API response, formats into flashcard
LLMGenerator
This class handles the calling to the Ollama API and response.
LoginController
This class is the login GUI controller
Main
The Main class extends application and is the static base of the program.
MyAccountController
 
MySubjectsController
A class that handles the My Subjects GUI
Result
A simple Model Class that represents a result - Who, What, When, Correct?
ResultDAO
The DAO object for interacting with the Results Table over the specified connection
SettingsController
 
UpdateFlashcardsController
Controller for the Update Flashcards screen.
User
A simple Model Class that represents a user.
UserDAO
The DAO object for interacting with the User Table over the specified connection
